snippet.title: Exciting Course Preview - Kotlin: Let's Build YouTube for Android
snippet.description:
Pleased to announce the Course Preview for the next Kotlin series on how to build out the YouTube application with basic components.  We wont be building out a video player until a later series though. However, we'll tackle all these major topics instead: 
- RecyclerView
- ViewHolder pattern
- Constraint Layout UI Designer
- How to make URL Requests
- JSON parsing
- Integrating 3rd party libraries
- Starting new Activities with Intents
- Navigation and Back Stack
- Loading WebView

Super excited, hope you're ready for all the fun.

Intermediate Training Core Data
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/intermediate-training-core-data

Instagram Firebase Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/instagram-firebase

Facebook Group
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1240636442694543/

iOS Basic Training Course
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/basic-training

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
